queries.query: CREATE TABLE "repo" ( "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, "title" TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, "star" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, "description" TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '' )
CREATE TABLE "lang" ( "id" INTEGER, "name" TEXT, FOREIGN KEY("id") REFERENCES "repo"("id") ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION, PRIMARY KEY ("id", "name") )
CREATE TABLE "tag" ( "id" INTEGER, "name" TEXT, FOREIGN KEY("id") REFERENCES "repo"("id") ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION, PRIMARY KEY ("id", "name") )
